author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: ‘Harvest Arts’ at Quarry Hill
text:
‘Harvest Arts’ at Quarry Hill Sep 29, 2015 
Camden — Quarry Hill invites the public to attend “Harvest Arts,” an exhibition of its residents’ original creative arts and crafts, Friday, Oct. 9, from 2 to 4 p.m. at the Anderson Inn at Quarry Hill, 30 Community Drive. 
Works on display will range from paintings and 3-D assemblages to needlework and other handcrafts. The event will feature live music by Camden harpist Millie Crocker. Admission and refreshments will be free of charge. 
Quarry Hill is a member of the Pen Bay Healthcare family of services. For more information,, call 921-6116; visit quarryhill.org ; or check the Quarry Hill Facebook page . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
